website_summaries.verdict: The best wall heater that offers a good blend of power, reliability, and easy installation.
pros: Easy-to-use controls with a built-in thermostat to automatically set the desired temperature
cons: Hard-wired installation may require a professional to be done correctly

customer_reviews.title: Good heat. Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. Good fan and heat output. Only gripe is The power connections are the top of the unit, so power wire is visible when mounted. I tried to camouflage mine with a grey electrical fitting (picture).
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fields

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and heats well
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built and aesthetically pleasing heating unit. I have this in an outdoor home office that is 180 square feet. I use this in conjunction with a Honeywell line voltage thermostat that works nicely. It has a knob on the side to control the heat, but I prefer to turn it up all the way and let the thermostat control it. This morning I had it turned off, and it was 54 degrees inside the home office. Ten minutes later it was up to 71 degrees. It isn't noisy when it kicks on and it seems to distribute the heat quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: RainierRandy

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The install was easy if you have any electrical experience.... If you don't then hire someone. This thing doesn't plug in its hard wired. I installed a new GFCI breaker for it because it was going in a laundry room. My main concern with it is that the temperature control seems to move on its own. I set it at and it crawls up over time. Not a huge deal but if you left for like 3 months it would be. I've taken to just taping it in place. I don't know if its the small vibration when the unit is on...
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long
customer_reviews.text: After initially installing the heater it was great, small size, good heat output. I was very pleased. Unfortunately, the heater only functioned for a couple months. After a couple months it would only turn on for a few minutes and then turn off for 10 minutes. This cycle continued rendering the heater useless since it does not stay on long enough to heat up the room. Very disappointed with this product, does not last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Preston

customer_reviews.title: Not for drying wet dogs
customer_reviews.text: I installed this heater in my grooming shop to dry wet dogs. Even on the highest setting, it did not completely dry the Great Pyrenees. Also, the dogs are terrified of it. Which I did not expect. I took it out of my grooming shop & installed it in my son’s room. It seems to dry him just fine & he isn’t nearly as scared of it. I will order it again in the future. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Skeemer118

customer_reviews.title: Great heater.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT little heater. Keeps a 200 sq ft sunroom warm in winter in the Finger Lakes Region of New York. I had to keep turning the temperature down because it does such a great job. My electrician installed it and said it was an easy install. My cats love that the heat comes out of the bottom. My only complaint is that the electrical cord is at the top of the unit, seems like it should be at the bottom, cord is short. It must be hard wired, no plug in. Really a great heater. Made in Germany.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Rockette

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Weve been using this heater now for over a month inside of our travel trailer. It heats up the place quickly and we LOVE the auto thermostat. The fan is quiet and the body looks nice. As far as the hookup goes, I ran a dedicated ciruit from the pedestal using 1/2" hard pipe with 12/2 wire (20 amp). That took a few hours and know how obviously, but the unit itself was easy to install. Only downside is the dial is a 1-2-3 setting and I wish it had a temp rating instead. I may eventually put an inline thermostat but it seems like this could have been built into the unit
customer_reviews.author: Joe McD

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: Bought one originally for the added on room above the garage which had an old propane heater. Bought two more for the entryway which was not heated when I bought the house last December. It used to be ice cold and the laundry pipes froze. Now they are the warmest rooms in my house! So far my electric bill is not high so seem to be efficient. I can leave for a week or more and not come home to a disaster from broken pipes. As far as installation, had an electrician pull wires for them. They said hanging hem on the walls was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Berlyn1955

customer_reviews.title: Not a plug-in space heater!
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I've had electrical training in the past, this is more of a commercial use heater it doesn't just plug in and work. You need to hardwire it or make a plug for it and even tho it says it has an internal thermostat it's not going to work right without adding an additional one. If you are looking for a space heater this isn't it! Although it's extremely well made and I'm sure works great it wasn't what I was expecting. This needs to be installed by someone that knows electrical.
customer_reviews.author: Br3ntl3ys

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tiny house or shed.
customer_reviews.text: Heats up an 8x16 tiny house in New England weather. Neat design that pulls cold air from the floor. ONE CAVEAT: works best when you turn it on a few hours before you need it. It is a little slow to warm but once it on, it is very warm. I keep it between 1-2 on average days and on 3 if it is below 32 degrees. Electrician hooked it up with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Air Force D

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS A COVER
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars were it not for the fact that it was not finished at the top. It does heat great and I am so glad that I ordered it. However, IT NEEDS SOME KIND OF COVER ON THE TOP AND TOP SIDES. You can see the wires. I made a cover out of wood that fits the top and side. Any kids or grandkids would have found wires intriguing. Could be dangerous. It needs some kind of cover for those not as handy to make their own.
customer_reviews.author: Mackathy

customer_reviews.title: Very high qaulity heater and very quiet. T-stat and timer functions
customer_reviews.text: Excellent heater, high quality. Turn on timer and or use the thermostat feature. We used this one in a restroom / shower room🚽 at work; the shower area was cool, but this heater worked like a champ to make it comfortable. Mounted on the wall, plugged already wired cord into the near by outlet. 115v. 15 amp circuit. Very quiet. Patrons if too cool, can turn the timer on and it goes to high mode; otherwise it functions at what ever the t-stat is set too😊 We can keep the temp. Cooler 68, then the patrons can use the timer to heat up the room quickly if needed. Grounded. No lock controls, both knobs on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: The Netter

customer_reviews.title: Top quality heater and great customer care!
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is solid, made in Germany! It’s been 2.5 years since I bought it, and I have been using it as a commercial unit for my short term rental business. Recently I accidentally broke the thermostat/switch because it’s slightly sticking and I must be twisting it with too much force. I called the phone number on the the sticker on the side of the unit, talked with customer service staff about the issue and they promptly send over a replacement part. It has been a great heater and I really like the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet heater but kinda weak air flow.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quiet heater but the clearances listed are inaccurate. The heater is able to run quiet at the expense of air flow. It gets very hot and blows weakly to achieve the low noise levels. Also, Amazon list a 4 inch vertical clearance on one document and a 36 inch Vertical clearance on another document. The instructions that came with the unit list a 12 inch vertical clearance. When I called the tech support to ask which is correct, they could not answer, but suggested the 12 inch is probably correct.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Knob twisted off on first use.
customer_reviews.text: The knob twisted off THE VERY FIRST TIME my wife turned it on so now I have to plug it in and unplug it every time. She’s not a gladiator of a woman either... The stop is too far down the plastic shaft from. This makes it way too easy to over torque the shaft. I’m happy with how much heat it puts out and the noise isn’t bad.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement for a cold room
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this in an extra bedroom we use when grandkids come and stay.its a cold room with inadequate duct work..Easy and quick installation. Hardwired. I wanted him to connect it to a thermostat he said we don't need it. Happy it's not made in China like everything else. In happy to not have to worry about a space heater in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Dvny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit for my small foyer
customer_reviews.text: Had it professionally installed on its own 120V circuit, no thermostat needed, as I use the built in dial control. It cycles on and off as needed per my setting, all winter season. The flow of air warms the floor and surrounding area just enough. I have a 4 ft x 6 ft entrance x 8 ft high ceiling, 3 exterior walls, so it gets bone chilling cold in there without any heat. This unit is not loud unless you are standing right next to it. My next update will be if it ever needs repair., hopefully not.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceLoveHappiness

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 4 months and now its malfunctioning. Turns on for 5 seconds then shuts off, you can switch to the next level and it stays on for 5 seconds then shuts off. Barely used
customer_reviews.author: MUKI LOK UNG

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: We've used this heater in a fully finished 10' x 12' office shed. On high it'll heat the whole space in less than ten minutes. It automatically shuts off once it reaches a certain temp... I'd say 80F or less (on the high setting). Medium setting it maintains around 72F. Low is around 65F. Its quiet. Not bothersome at all. Comes with its own mounting bracket. Easy peasy! We've used it all winter long! No issues! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: John A. Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Great heater for my 12x20 shop
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small but heats great. My building is insulated and I really like this heater. Keeps everything from freezing as long as it has power it will automatically come on and keep it warm. I do not want it to be 75 in my shop and this little heater would run you out if you set it higher. I keep mine on 1 or 1.5 and it is perfect and very quite.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Nash

customer_reviews.title: Straight up hot!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a shed makeover. I had a professional install it but they said, not a problem. It blows hot... immediately. Aint no warming this baby up. It'll be great when it gets cold.
customer_reviews.author: cimking

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not warm enough.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not warm enough for a large room. And uses a LOT of electricity. My room can’t get above 69 degrees F even if I leave it on the top number for an hour. The description does not say at all that it’s only for a room of 150sq ft. It’s only when I read through ALL 95 reviews did I find that out. It should be in the description. Also the fan is a bit noisy. Giving 2 stars because it is a sleek unit and fairly easy to have installed...but the description is MISLEADING...If I could return it I would.
customer_reviews.author: ajo

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement over electric baseboard heater.
customer_reviews.text: A standard electric baseboard heater just was inadequate in the bathroom. This guy is great! Warms the room in two minutes while maintaining a tolerable noise level. But, previous criticisms still apply. They’ve made no arrangement for concealment of the bright yellow 12-2 Romex required for electrical service and so only four stars. I had to invent my own which seems to be fine. Yeah-yeah-yeah, I know there still is painting to be done.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome replacement heater
customer_reviews.text: My old wall heater died and I chose this as its replacement. The delivery was really quick and it took less than 30 minutes to install it myself. It is the only heater I have in my 12 x 13 bedroom and I don't even have the dial turned up but a 1/4 of the way before it heats up my room nicely. I've only had it for less than a week, but I'd highly recommend this. If my opinion changes, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Volpi

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my heater
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my heater. But after talking to the electrician, I wish I had purchased the 240 volt heater. They were the same price / make and my wiring was already 240. But other than the expense to rewire to 120 volt, I love my new heater. Nice low profile when hanging on the wall. It still gives me more than enough heat for my condo kitchen. I think it will heat 290 sq ft. The blower is very quiet. Germans make a good product. If this product was from China, I would be concerned about dependability.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, realistic expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive appliance and the innards look elegantly engineered. It does not blast out heat. Hardly a change in room temp after running a half hr. I would place it low to the floor a couple feet from where you will be standing to towel off. It's a slow and steady flow of warm air.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence L. Lunt

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. I had installed a Stiebel Eltron tankless water heater in my condo and it worked really well. So when I saw that the company also makes this heater, it was an easy decision. The unit puts out sufficient heat in a small bathroom, extremely quiet and looks fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Has to be mounted near a wall outlet.
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent product. heat exits out toward the floor. I had 2 in the wall mounted heaters that one quit. I patched the hole and ran the romex through the patch and directly wired it to the wiring for the old heater. I mounted another across from existing heater near a wall outlet and it does a better job than the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth C.

customer_reviews.title: Simple & High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Electric resistance heaters are pretty simple yet many are poorly constructed and not well designed when it comes to reliability, longevity, safety, maintenance, audible noise, as well as cosmetics. This heater is a bit high on cost but I am very happy with it regarding these design qualities. I will be making some minor mods to mine to allow fan-only operation (draw hot air down from ceiling) and allow disable of 1 of the 2 heater elements, to give more flexibility in the usage.
customer_reviews.author: Renaldo

customer_reviews.title: Question frost protection
customer_reviews.text: The frost protection feature is not reliable. Have it set on 1 in a small guest cabin (insulated) and read 28 degrees on my thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Witt

customer_reviews.title: It works, and it's not too hard on the eyes.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are no better than what I saw in the online description, but I figured it out. What the picture does not show you is that the unit rests against the wall on four plastic feet, and there is a gap at the top that allows a clear view of the Romex entering the heater. I am not a fan of visible wiring, but the unit blows hot air as soon as you turn it on, and does so quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Graham

customer_reviews.title: imagine most will preform ok, looks good didn't have time to wait for another one.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't work properly start heating then would quit several seconds later would repeat same process. ,loved the design. I'm sure most of them work fine. easy return.
customer_reviews.author: larry jackson

customer_reviews.title: Basement Bathroom heater
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my basement bathroom. It works great, and looks good. You'll want a professional installer unless you're an electrician with all of the right supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: Works great, was for our bathroom.....just be aware that you need to add a power cord to it...it comes ready to hardwire to your electric....but we needed it pluggable. Easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F Bivins

customer_reviews.title: Great heater but to noisy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heater. Easily mounts on the wall and can be combined with a wall thermostat for easy access. I'd give it five stars but it's a bit loud. To loud for a a living room or bedroom. We had ours in the mud room but it was to noisy at night so we moved it in to our studio where we are busy making noise of our own.
customer_reviews.author: Journemon

customer_reviews.title: Untrustworthy don't know when it'll work
customer_reviews.text: Blows hardly any heat no matter what number it's on and then sometimes if it's on even just 1 it'll blow non stop heat. This thing is retarded
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater. Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome piece of machinery. Small and powerful. Had to get an electrician to install but it was well worth it. Sometimes it gets louder than expected but I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Quite and effective. Very simple and works perfectly. ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite and effective. Very simple and works perfectly. As others have mentioned there is no cable, but a quick trip to the hardware store can fix this, allowing one to wire it for either a plug or for a direct connection. Direct connection is how mine is wired giving me a Zero Wires installation. The thermostat works perfectly. My wife turned this up in the middle of the night and by morning our bathroom and master bath were stiflingly hot.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice and toasty
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bathroom heater. It heats up very quickly and efficiently. My only complaint is that it is loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great heat output but loud
customer_reviews.text: puts out heat instantly which is great for a bathroom which is where i installed. I subtracted a star because it's really loud especially after two years of use and and a half star because it's a little expensive compared to comps. 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A great unit for a small area
customer_reviews.text: I previously had one of these wall heaters and when it stopped working I didn’t hesitate to order a new one the one I had has been in the house I purchased for at least 10 years could’ve been longer it’s great to have it works awesome
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heater....but
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heater...but it needs an on/off switch. There are times when I want it to NOT come on at all. Like when we shut our cabin down for the winter. It continues to come on intermittently and I waste electricity. Other than that....it's GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stamm

customer_reviews.title: Nice little unit!!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great in tool shed. Wired it to a wall timer so I don’t forget to turn it off. Had it installed by an electrician friend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ploszkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Junction box connection NOT good
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the electrical connection shows a very large gap between junction box and the unit. It is showing wire. After going through the review on amazon it looks like an issue for most people. I copied what others have done to fix this issue and it appears to be ok now.
customer_reviews.author: X. Lan

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This product is ineffective at heating my 10’ by 12’ bathroom. It turns on for 30 seconds then turns off never adequately heating my cabin bathroom in Montana! They did not respond to my email to explain what could be done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quiet heater
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quiet heater, well designed. As others have posted you can see the romex connector and romex when looking down from the top. I just used 1/2" PVC instead and it didn't look bad. It cost more but it sounds better and its surface mount which is quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Also good to keep pipes from freezing in the winter!
customer_reviews.text: We use it in our 2nd floor bathroom. Works well. Also good to keep pipes from freezing in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's just a great heater
customer_reviews.text: You turn it on and I mean there is instant Heat, it works great and it blows down toward your feet and will warm up a room In a hurry
customer_reviews.author: rsmith4857

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking & works as a German machine should :)
customer_reviews.text: Works well, relatively easy installation which cost me $80 for an electrician (he was done in 30-45 min), looks good, doesn't take much space.
customer_reviews.author: Olga B.

customer_reviews.title: SOLVED OUR CHILLY BATHROOM PROBLEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this heater so much I purchased another one for our second bathroom. I purchased these heaters to take the chill out of our bathrooms after coming out of the shower in the cooler months. How we're nice and toasty. I also liked the fact that they run on 110 volts and can be hard wired or fitted with a plug to use a wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: SANDKEYFRED

customer_reviews.title: Protect wireway entrance with appropriate fitting.
customer_reviews.text: Installed 3 units as supplemental heat source. Very quiet operation, attractive looking, and moves air well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicest one I have seen and used.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for over a year. I have it connected to a wall thermostat. It keeps our basement laundry/utility room warm. Everyone who sees it states they want to get one as they love the simple but elegant design. The outside of the heater stays cool (minus the actual outflow register which gets hot but not super hot).
customer_reviews.author: Bernese Mtn. Dog Mark

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding unit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our cabin. Works great. Wall mount, great look, heats well. Easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in a small bathroom which has no other heat and is on an outside wall. It has worked quite well and looks good also. Yes, you have to hard wire it. Don't buy it if you don't know what that means. I used a standard cable clamp, 1/2" I think. It puts out a nice strong flow of heat immediately. It has been going good for over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, stylish, and takes up a small footprint in the wall. I also like that the heat is directed downwards
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Used was new in damaged package. Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Used as bathroom heater. Seems to be working well but hasn't had much use yet. I am hopeful I don't have the problems others have written about. I bought used or damaged packaging. Unit was flawless and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: mike serra

customer_reviews.title: works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: JUST what we were looking for to put in our building that our kennels are in easy install !!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works like a trooper
customer_reviews.text: Teamed up with my Levolt Humidifier spells comfort all winter long.
customer_reviews.author: MHB

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat as large an area as it claims ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not heat as large an area as it claims. Takes a long time to make it even mildly warm.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Room heater
customer_reviews.text: This heater will more than adequately heat your bathroom! It was easy to install, and has manual knob to set the heat level and the thermostat keeps from over heating the room!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ott

customer_reviews.title: A+ design and function
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 12×12×10 gym. No other source of heat and the room is warm within 10 minutes. Great design and function. It's all metal which feels sturdier than many of the other options out there. I've also gotten a few compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Chante D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was what I expected, works great and provides warmth in. 12 X12 room easy install
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Found out about these when I visited a coastal Resort. A really great and very effective heater. I purchased three for my cabin and they work well there. You will love the easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Walter B. Dorny

customer_reviews.title: very good heater
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Heats a decent sized bathroom in only a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Dale R. Meade

customer_reviews.title: Best little heater
customer_reviews.text: Best little heater. We put this in our bathroom and it turned out to work fantastic! My nephew who is an electrician hard wired it up to a light switch. We absolutely LOVE this little heater. He didnt like the way you could see some wiring that was exposed on the back so he cut a small piece of pvc pipe and put it over the wires. Looks like it was meant to be there. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cormier

customer_reviews.title: This heater is fantastic. Easy to install and really heats our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This heater is fantastic. Easy to install and really heats our bathroom. Buy it, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: 82Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: Did research for a good small bathroom heater this unit had good reviews. Bought one in November and by January it had stopped working. 10 days after the return period. Do not buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McGee

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Made well but does not heat up my very small space.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it works and how it looks.. Doesn't take up much room
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking unit.  Cable visible when hard wired.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking unit. Easy to install. Only issue is that the electrical cord is visible when hard wired to a circuit. There is about 1" of the cable that is visible before it enters into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Louie Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and quality
customer_reviews.text: We first saw this little wall heater at a B&B in California back in December last year. It was mounted in the bath and did a great job of heating the whole room quickly and quietly. We now have one in our bath and are very satisfied with the quality and looks of the unit. European styling and German engineering - a hard combination to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Don46

customer_reviews.title: nice looking and works well
customer_reviews.text: This wall heater heats up the room quickly and quietly. In my opinion its also a very nice looking wall heater.
customer_reviews.author: S Lowe

customer_reviews.title: heat output
customer_reviews.text: Likes the size and look, works great for what we wanted it
customer_reviews.author: Gabino Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Heats quickly and quietly!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was straight forward. Fits in lots of spaces. Heats the room quickly and the motor is quiet and shuts off when it get to temp. Is not hot to touch!
customer_reviews.author: Angela D Siderius

customer_reviews.title: Stiebel Eltron 074058 120-Volt
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a bit larger. I wish it had #4 heat setting.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Add cord hang on wall and forget
customer_reviews.text: A nice small room heater. Quiet and very light weight. You will need to supply your own correctly rated power cable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian  Sponaugle

customer_reviews.title: Had unit professionally installed by licensed electrician. After 13 ...
customer_reviews.text: Had unit professionally installed by licensed electrician. After 13 months of use in my garage the unit just stopped functioning right in the dead of winter. terrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Nice heater to install in a bathroom. A big improvement over free-standing heaters that look ugly and may overheat. Very good output of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Fogg

customer_reviews.title: Give it time
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good heater...quite easy to install. I'm giving it the winter to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Morris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install as well as being aesthetically pleasing for ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install as well as being aesthetically pleasing for what it is. The only thing I would add is a finish grill or intake grill at the top of the unit for appearance sake only.
customer_reviews.author: Cej

customer_reviews.title: warmth
customer_reviews.text: Heater was easy to install, heats up bathroom fasts, fully satisfied. Did have to go buy rubber grommet to allow wire into heater.
customer_reviews.author: Louis J Baer

customer_reviews.title: Really good heater
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these heaters and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: streetdoc

customer_reviews.title: Wall heater = great for a small room
customer_reviews.text: This product was used for a bedroom and warms it pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: benz81

customer_reviews.title: Good little heater
customer_reviews.text: It worked out very well for a bathroom heater. It heats much more quickly than the radiant heater that it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mausoleum bathroom relief!
customer_reviews.text: Great *great* heater for the bathroom here. Wish it had a template for the install, but I got it right the 2nd time and this home is much happier in the winter mornings!
customer_reviews.author: AnonyMouse

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient. Works great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works like a boss. Very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: ComonIwanttolayya

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: These are the best heaters for area's that need extra heat like bathrooms.

customer_reviews.title: Efficiency
customer_reviews.text: This heater is not only awesome looking, it is very efficient and easy to operate
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Stiebel Heater 120 Volt
customer_reviews.text: I received this heater quickly and in good shape. It was easy to install and works great! I think it will keep my toes warm when I shower this winter. I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Howard

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you it is wired to properly
customer_reviews.text: I have two of them , Love the heater , But they should offer a plug in cord with this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Amazon for carrying this great little heater- works great, looks nice, warms a 300 square foot room just fine (we also insulated the room very well-that helps). I love this heater- bought two more for our main house! Recommend highly!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, but less heat than I expected. Low air flow....
customer_reviews.author: Matt Locke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great product and well worth the $. Keeps the mud room warm and is very quiet. Sturdy unit.
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Does a nice job of heating an insulated 12x12 metal sided room. The room is built inside a non insulated metal barn.
customer_reviews.author: Rtwodie

customer_reviews.title: The gap on top REALLY bugs me
customer_reviews.text: Good heater. Nice looking design. Pretty quiet. As others have reported, the gap on top REALLY bugs me. There is no reason the power knockout cant be located correctly. Why would the designers want you to have such a clear view of the romex power wire? What is the purpose for such a design? Ugly must be a fashion statement in germany. I bought another one because its a nice heater and will come up with a good looking fix myself.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Easy to install. Plenty of heat generator-ed. Good heat controls. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Welling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well as a supplementary heat in our bathroom. Sufficiently heats the floor tiles in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: bass

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the heating element works fine but the fan does not come on.
customer_reviews.author: Jerald DeMille

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional build quality. Not some Made in China crap. The elements heats up pretty fast, and also pretty quiet. I am using it to heat a 120 sqft room with 8ft ceiling. It does take some time heating the room but I am limited to 1.5kW.
customer_reviews.author: Tahsin

customer_reviews.title: Renovation
customer_reviews.text: Not yet installed. But will make a nice addition in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf4020

product_meta.title: Stiebel Eltron 074058 120-Volt 1500-Watts Wall Mounted Electric Fan Heater
product_meta.description:
Stiebel Eltron 074058 Model CK 15 E Wall-Mounted Electric Fan Heater, 120 Volts, 1500 Watts, 12.5A, 5118 Btu/hr Rated Output, 18W Shaded Pole Motor, Extremely Quiet Operation at 49.7 dB(a)

The CK, CKT, and CK Trend are designed and made in Germany. These elegant, surface-mount fan heaters are extremely quiet. They are a simple solution to quickly add heat to a room that may not get enough heat from a central source, as sometimes happens with a mini-split retrofit, or they can add heat to a space that never had it before, like a porch retrofit. CK, CKT, and CK Trend heaters have an integral thermostat, but the CK can be linked to a central thermostat if it is installed in a room larger than 215 sq. ft.Stiebel Eltron CK wallmounted fan heaters use a small, quiet fan to pull in room air and send out heated air. These heaters are perfect for spaces like bathrooms that already have a primary heat source, but may need a little extra heat added quickly.

Key Features * Sleek European surface-mount design
 * Extremely quiet operation at 49.7 dB(a)
 * Built-in thermostat for maximum comfort
 * Downdraft design heats space evenly
 * Quality German manufacturing
 * Frost protection setting
 * Ideal anywhere quick heat is needed

Specifications * Voltage: 120V
 * Wattage: 1500W
 * Amperage: 12.5A
 * Rated output: 5118 Btu/hr
 * Recommended circuit breaker size: 15A
 * Minimum wire size (copper): 14 AWG
 * Heating element: Nichrome wire
 * Thermostat & high limit: Bimetal type
 * Motor: 18W shaded pole
 * Blower: Galvanized steel, squirrel cage type
 * Temperature range: 41°F – 86°F / 5°C – 30°C
 * Frost protection setting: 45°F / 7°C
 * Operating noise: 49.7 dB(a)
 * Dimensions (HxWxD): 18-1/8" x 13-3/16" x 4-13/16"
 * Weight: 8.0 lbs



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Stiebel Eltron CK 15E Wall Mounted Electric Fan Heater-120V/1500 watts offers and exciting room heating alternative for new construction and renovation projects. This unit is an ideal replacement for recess-mount heaters.
feature_bullets: Built in thermostat for maximum comfort
Reliable performance.Heat output for the CK 15E is 5122 BTU/hr
